title: nightly upgrade panic due to unrecognized configuration for raft-engine.recovery-mode
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
Any

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Any

### Steps to reproduce

Upgrade to nightly after #10937 

### What did you expect?

Success

### What did happened?

Panics:
```
thread 'main' panicked at 'invalid auto generated configuration file /mnt/nvmessd1/centos/three-tikv-cdc/data/tikv-20160/last_tikv.toml, err unknown variant `tolerate-corrupted-tail-records`, expected one of `absolute-consistency`, `tolerate-tail-corruption`, `tolerate-any-corruption` for key `raft-engine` at line 660 column 1', src/config.rs:2885:13
```
